meanings.definition: A group of drugs used to lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cholestyramines to help reduce my cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Many people take cholestyramines to manage their cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: I joked that cholestyramines were like tiny cholesterol fighters in my body.
meanings.sent4: Taking cholestyramines is like having a team of cholesterol warriors in your bloodstream.
meanings.sent5: The image of cholestyramines battling cholesterol is quite vivid.

meanings.definition: The plural form of cholestyramine, a medication used to treat high cholesterol.
meanings.sent1: She asked the pharmacist for cholestyramines to help with her high cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended cholestyramines for patients with elevated cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: The cholestyramines in the bottle looked like tiny cholesterol-fighting soldiers.
meanings.sent4: In the war against high cholesterol, cholestyramines are valuable allies.
meanings.sent5: The concept of cholestyramines fighting cholesterol is easy to remember.
